content.text: I really like music! What about you?
Yes! I do too, I love listening to music. What type of music do you like?

I like all types of music, but I'm especially fond of Greek music because it reminds me of my family's heritage. I love to listen to music about animals when I walk my dog. What's your favorite fruit?
Watermelon! It's so sweet and refreshing. I also love bananas and oranges.
I like bananas too! I've never been to the beach. Do you like going to the beach?

I love going to the beach! I love swimming, sunbathing, and building sandcastles. I'm taking a year off before college and my daily routine is pretty relaxed. I like to make sure I get some reading in on the weekends. I also volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. What do you do for fun?
I like to knit. It's a relaxing hobby that I can do while watching TV. I also like to play with my dog, go for walks, and play video games. I'm in elementary school right now.
That's awesome! I love to knit too! I'm not very good at it, but it's a fun hobby to have. I'm glad you're enjoying elementary school! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun in the years to come
